title: Associate Professorship in Management - All Fields - Department of Management
description: the department of management at aarhus bss aarhus university invites applications for a number of associate professors the field of management the associate professorship is a full time and permanent position starting by the fall of or as soon as possible subject to mutual agreement job description the successful applicant is expected to contribute significantly to the department s research and teaching environment and to the overall research strategy of the school you are expected to teach and supervise students at bachelor s master s and phd level and to carry out individual and group based research of the highest international standard contributing to the development of our academic field on this occasion and without prejudice the department especially welcomes applicants who can teach and do research the following areas management information systems organisation behaviour design and hrm management accounting international business marketing innovation management entrepreneurship corporate communication strategy project management qualifications applicants must possess research qualifications and teaching skills corresponding to those obtained after successful completion of a period of employment as assistant professor but equivalent academic qualifications may be accepted permanent employment as associate professor at aarhus bss requires completion of the as well as the course provided by centre for teaching and learning at aarhus bss if you have not completed the courses prior to employment continued employment be conditional on completion of the courses within a five year period who we are the department of management is one of the six departments at aarhus bss one of the four faculties at aarhus university aarhus bss unites the research fields of business and social sciences bringing them closer together to reflect the close relationship between society and the business community as part of a top university aarhus bss and specifically the department of management has achieved the distinguished aascb amba and equis accreditations the latter specifically applying to the school s core business activities the department s research and teaching environment is highly international and culturally diverse with a mix of danish and international academic staff members and phd students we employ more than academic staff including researchers phd students research associates and cover a broad range of disciplines within management e g marketing corporate communication international business organization hr strategy management accounting innovation management entrepreneurship project management and information systems we aim to conduct high quality research and we give high priority to publishing our research leading academic journals and presenting it at recognised conferences addition we have a dynamic exchange of international researchers who stay at the department for short or long periods of time for more information about the department of management please visit international applicant find information about entering and working denmark further information for further information about the position and the department please contact head of department jacob kjćr eskildsen tel email if you need help uploading your application or have any questions about the recruitment process please contact hr supporter frederik sřrensen tel email place of work aarhus bss department of management fuglesangs allé dk aarhus v denmark terms of employment the appointment is accordance with the as well as the job content and qualification requirements are described further detail circular on terms of employment for academic staff at universities application procedure it is mandatory to attach the following when you apply for this position application letter curriculum vitae you are encouraged to state any periods of leave without research activity including for example maternity leave since your research activities are assessed relation to your actual research time education diploma for master s phd and possibly higher doctoral degree list of publications the enclosed publications must be clearly marked on the list of publications publications up to publications can be included the application the event of several authors the publications must be accompanied by a co author statement concerning the applicant s share of the collaborative work with the consent of the co authors this form can be used for the purpose teaching portfolio the specific requirements regarding the documentation can be found here materials which cannot be uploaded together with the application may be submitted five copies to aarhus bss hr phd aarhus university tĺsingegade floor dk aarhus c read more about how to apply for academic post at aarhus bss here the evaluation process after the application deadline assessment committee is appointed please note that the assessment of applicants is based solely on the material received prior to the application deadline for further information see all interested candidates are encouraged to apply regardless of personal background deadline all title: Postdoctoral Researchers
description: who we are looking for we are looking for full time postdoctoral researchers desiring to advance knowledge the domain of innovation management qualified candidates demonstrate excellence their publication and presentation record and possess a high potential research pipeline we are seeking individuals who enjoy a collaborative interdisciplinary environment have a proven track record teaching across program levels and possess excellent english communication skills written and oral postdoctoral researchers have completed a phd a field related to innovation management such as business administration economics healthcare management health sciences public health industrial engineering psychology sociology etc candidates have demonstrated expertise one or more empirical methodologies how to apply please send a cover letter current cv including three references phd diploma and a sample publication to prof dr jelena spanjol spanjol bwl lmu de by july early applications are strongly encouraged the position is a fixed term appointment for the duration of three years with option to extend pending a positiv evaluation a conversion to indefinite position tenure track is not possible starting dates be individually arranged the successful candidate work towards completion of a habilitation during the appointment german civil service regulations need to be met lmu munich provides newly appointed faculty with various services including welcome services and dual career support lmu munich is equal opportunity employer and intends to enhance the diversity of its faculty the case of essentially equal qualifications applicants with impairments be given preference the option of part time employment is available principle we encourage women to apply for questions or informal discussion about the position please contact prof dr jelena spanjol spanjol bwl lmu de e mail color display block text align left font weight bold font size padding bottom img right color title: Research and Teaching Assistants
description: who we are looking for qualified team members be characterized by intellectual curiosity perseverance and a strong interest conducting and publishing theoretically grounded managerially meaningful research we are seeking individuals with outstanding organizational skills proven collaborative and independent work competences and excellent english and german communication abilities written and oral applicants have the possibility of gaining a doctoral degree research and teaching assistants demonstrate a superior academic record and excellence a completed university degree master or equivalent business administration economics management marketing psychology sociology or other domains relevant to innovation management and a strong motivation to conduct high quality internationally oriented research methodological experience one or more techniques such as experimental design and analysis ethnography netnography multilevel modeling structural equation modeling and textual analysis among others is highly desirable how to apply if you are interested being part of a vibrant internationally oriented institute and a motivated and engaged team that conducts research and teaching on issues relating to innovation management please email your application including all standard application materials cv diplomas transcripts certificates etc combined one pdf file mb max to prof dr jelena spanjol spanjol bwl lmu de please include a brief one page statement outlining your motivation for applying for this position applications should be submitted no later than june early applications are strongly encouraged the case of essentially equal qualification applicants with impairments be given preference the option of part time employment is available principle we encourage women to apply for questions or informal discussion about the position please contact prof dr jelena spanjol spanjol bwl lmu de e mail color display block text align left font weight bold development and compliance of high quality standards as well as multiple operational activities related to quality assurance the operational activities contain amongst others the creation of documents the execution of audits the capa management the handling of complaints and deviations the training of employees and the development of quality systems together with your team you ensure gmp compliant title: Country Operations Manager - Real-World Insights (RWI) - Germany
description: quintilesims is leading the development of a new business service the foundation for which is a pan european infrastructure to collect aggregate and report on pharmaceutical product use at a patient level partnering with healthcare data providers this new real world insights rwi initiative bring develop access aggregate and codify patient level data sources across multiple global geographies and create a solution that allow for enhanced strategicen decision making across the pharmaceutical and healthcare sector background rwi develops strategicen business cases for investment acquisitions organicen business growth creates strategicen thought leadership supports complex business development options taking a leadership role around rwi runs complex new engagement types with clients supporting to get most value of high cost investments rwi data assets and capabilities with direct access to the world s most comprehensive information analytic and consulting research resources and healthcare intelligence tools rwi experts deliver deep insights into pathway design effectiveness of healthcare interventions and products and value for money we are one of only a few organizations that integrate real world insights health economics outcomes research consulting and health intelligence tools at the national and international level across the healthcare value chain role this pan european initiative is gathering momentum and now requires a dedicated operations manager positioned within each market who report to the country programme manager managing the day to day execution of tasks support of the establishment of the initiative that market the operations manager lead the execution of tasks critical to the country specific implementation approach as developed by the country programme manager with the guidance of the rwi central team it is envisioned that each country have a small dedicated team to adapt the overarching european strategy to the specifics of the market customization to healthcare setting adaptation to specialty care environment centre enrollment deployment planning it emr engagement project and contract management the country operations manager lead the execution of specific projects and workstreams within the programme per the country programme manager s plan against time cost and quality benchmarks as such it is a high profile role of strategicen importance principle responsibilities management of the day to day tasks to implement the country programme across each of the phases e g development pilot and deployment this includes management of the delivery of work to adapt the overall european strategy for the specifics of the country market ensuring country specificities are understood and adaptations made per the country level project plan as directed by the initiative country programme manager tracking progress on country specific workstreams and providing updates to initiative leadership and client consortium members responsibility for conducting country programme governance and complying with central governance requirements provide line management and local leadership for junior members of the country initiative team provide leadership and direction for the country functional and project teams experience and skills bs ba required advanced degree preferred ideally a discipline relevant to the life sciences industry strong commercial experience the life sciences arena with focus on project management data analytics or consulting first hand experience of the hospital sector and or specialty care environment country must have strong ability to influence decision makers demonstrated experience managing complex projects or programs relevant project management certifications such as pmp are a plus experience leading execution of complex programs that include technology implementation components is a strong plus excellent oral presentation and writing skills must be capable of leading with a sense of urgency and be able to work both independently and within a team environment must have had exposure to fasen moving and highly pressurised environments with frequent exposure to senior stakeholders must be calm and focussed when dealing with complex or rapidly changing priorities exposure to patient level outcomes data implementation of technology solutions with particular emphasis on hospitals commercial organizations within healthcare services experience with technology solutions advisory some familiarity with oncology would be advantage locationsfrankfurt quintilesims is equal opportunity employer we cultivate a diverse corporate culture across the countries where we operate celebrating and rewarding teamwork and inclusiveness by embracing our manufacture coatings systems for use a range of end applications you get the opportunity to gain a wide range of applications experience they are a family owned business they have long term strategy focused on sustainable organicen growth meaning they are very stable you can stay with the company for a long time the business invests heavily product innovation they always have new technologies the pipeline alongside the new products that they develop based on existing technologies you get to work on projects which help to shape the success of the company the next years allowing you to have a title: Global Head of Industrial Quality and Lean (m/f)
description: as part of the zumtobel group zumtobel stands for holistic lighting solutions that above all enhance people s wellbeing the brand s products unite award winning design with thoughtful integration into the architectural setting as innovation leader zumtobel offers exceptional range of premium luminaires and lighting control systems across the full range of applications job descriptionin this key role you assume full responsibility for quality within global manufacturing and supplier quality your main fields of work are you develop and establish a global production and supplier quality organization as well as lean implementation across the globe you develop and implement the quality control plan across all plants including warranty covering and full quality cost model as well as kpi s you develop and lead implementations of lean resulting a zumtobel production system you initiate and lead complex and critical cross functional projects and drive the organization to excellent results you coach and support the local management teams within the sites terms of lessons learned best practice sharing and build global standards you define and improve standards for supplier quality approval and component release processes and assure them via your organization as well as via quality assurance agreements cooperation with global purchasing you define and monitor relevant kpi s and provide clustered feedback to the relevant functions within the organization and initiate projects to improve where necessary you assume responsibility for the iso certification and compliance for all plants including internal external audit and process management your profileyou have a master degree engineering science economics or comparable disciplines international manufacturing process and lean experience should be more than years and a solid quality education is advantageous you are more than years within a senior management role on a global level and have proven success leading cross functional global teams a fasen changing industry you gained already tangible experience project management and qm principles tools on a global level and apply a holistic approach to your daily work your english and german knowledge is perfect goal oriented and pro active person with analytical foresight intercultural expertise a clear idea of what is feasible strong teamwork capabilities and willingness for international travel solid knowledge within the lighting industry or comparable would be beneficial applications to robert wolffen t your careerwe curiously discover new fields of work together our mentoring program is meant to support you to fully develop your skills and potentials international perspectivebe part of a network of creativity and high tech and contribute to ecosystem that enables you to realize your potential within multinational intercultural teams work life balanceyour best individual work life balance vary over time often on a daily basis this why we offer flexible working models and sabbatical options for our employees open minded and respectful cultureworking for the zg means to be a part of open minded and passionate culture based on the spirit of the company s founder dr walter zumtobel

title: Research assistant / PhD position in molecular basis of congenital adrenal hyperplasia (f/m)
description: applications are invited for a phd position at the endocrine research labs of the medical department iv university of munich on the transregional crc trr the adrenal central relay health and disease funded by the deutsch dfg a unique effort top level researchers and doctors of the university hospitals of munich dresden and wόrzburg promote the understanding of humoral and molecular mechanisms of adrenal diseases and develop improved diagnosticen and therapeutic approach the phd student m f be joining a highly motivated and expanding team of researchers studying the protein stability congenital adrenal hyperplasia one of the most common inborn metabolic disorders the successful applicant m f be expected to attend and present his her data at national and international scientific conferences particular the phd position involves protein biochemistry protein purification protein helfen life bret co immunoprecipitation thermal shift assay isothermal titration calorimetry immunofluorescence molecular biology genotyping cloning site directed mutagenesis cell biology and functional assays enzyme activity assays preparation of publications and lectures exposure to a vibrant scientific environment with multiple collaborative bonds to researchers from the whole sfb consortium we seek master s degree or equivalent preferably biology pharmacology or biochemistry and allied disciplines with a strong commitment to research demonstrated problem solving skills and attention to detail strong communication skills and fluency english open mindedness self motivation and abiltity to work independently national and international translational research we offer innovativ and multifaceted research a stimulating national and international research environment training provided all areas of molecular and cell biology flexible working hours the remuneration for this position conforms to the stipulations set out the tarifvertrag lδnder tv l for detailed information on the research topic and the position please contact ms pd dr nicole reisch email for further information please visit our website the post is available from july closing dat for receipt of applications is june disabled persons be preferentially considered case of equal qualification presentation costs cannot be refunded please note that case of transmitting your job application by email your data not be encrypted and might potentially be noticed or adulterated by unauthorized third parties you are welcome to send us your documents by mail applicants m f should submit their complete application documents stating the reference number k including cv motivation letter certificates and at least two references as a single pdf file to klinikum universitδt mόnch frankfurt main deutsch börse ag opens up international capital markets for its customers its product and service portfolio covers the entire process chain from securities and derivatives trading through the settlement of transactions and provision of market information to the development and operation of electronic trading systems with its process oriented business model deutsch börse increases the efficiency of capital markets committed employees are the key factor for innovation and further growth without them deutsch börse group would not have developed into one of the most modern exchange organisations the world more than employees work for the group a dynamic motivated and international team the md s content lab develops unique and scalable ip to drive growth deutsch börse s services and products the content lab identifies specifies harvests and creates themes datasets and advanced analytics that support financial decision makers their investment and trading decisions furthermore the md s content lab acts as a centre of excellence for data science and analytics for all business lines of deutsch börse group as a senior data scientist you lead projects to research and develop innovativ quantitative models using datasets from within deutsch börse group as well as new datasets outside of the group to provide added value for the groups businesses across the entire value chain your responsibilities leading research projects and directing junior staff creating advanced quantitative models screening of cutting edge academic literature and interacting with leading academics quantitative modelling identification of new valuable datasets outside of deutsch börse group presentation of results models data to internal service line and clients working with service line product development to support productization of the ip instruction and oversight of work of more junior data scientists our requirements advanced university degree phd preferred natural or computer sciences with strong quantitative inclination minimum of years work experience developing advanced quantitative models the financial services industry or big data analysis superior command of necessary software and tools for creation of quantitative models hands on pragmaticen attitude excellent communication and presentation skills displays thought leadership internally and externally strong team player willing to cooperate with multiple colleagues across office locations passionate and enthusiastic about creating new ideas and driving innovation very strong english title: Clinical Research Associate, home or office based
description: tfs international is the leading mid size clinical contract research organization cro providing global clinical development solutions founded sweden tfs currently operates over countries throughout europe and north america tfs supports multiple therapeutic areas and provides services worldwide through two business areas tfs developtm and tfs peopletm detailed information about tfs its business offerings global locations and recent press releases can be obtained through www tfscro com the clinical research associate cra is part of clinical monitoring within tfs develop and function operationally as a member of a project team and is responsible for the initiation onâ site and remote monitoring and termination of investigative sites during study conduct according to company policies sops and regulatory requirements the cra may conduct all stages of site monitoring feasibility pre study initiation interim and close out ability to travel as needed may involve overnight and international travel essential job functions monitor on site and remotely clinical trials accordance with tfs and or client company standard operating procedures fda regulations and gcp and guidelines review crfs paper or electronic and subject source documentation for validity and accuracy and generate queries to investigational sites clients to resolve problem data identify site problems deficiencies and bring to the attention of management through trip reporting memos and verbal communication with project manager or lead cra initiates corrective action to resolve issues as directed by supervisor contribute to the completion of the application to ethics committee irb prepare necessary documentation enclosed to the application according to local requirements cooperation with cta and directed by lead cra project manager participate contract handling and negotiation directed by lead cra project manager set up isf and smf or cooperate with cta and distribute to the investigational sites cooperation with study team responsible for smf maintenance order ship and reconcile clinical investigative supplies for study sites if applicable order ship and coordination of study supplies at site may prepare and submit status reports as directed by lead cra pm review and support site staff to maintain smf review informed consent documents for essential elements and protocol specifics update ctms system with site and study information may audit data tables and text of clinical summaries may assist the preparation of study documentation such as crf completion guidelines patient diaries study participation cards by reviewing for accuracy and completeness prepare check requisitions for sponsor project manager approval when applicable requirements bachelorâ s degree preferably life science or nursing or equivalent minimum years of relevant clinical experience able to work a fasen paced environment with changing priorities understand basic medical terminology and science associated with the assigned drugs and therapeutic areas possess the understanding of good clinical practice regulations guidelines ability to work independently as well as a team matrix organization excellent written and verbal communication skills excellent organizational skills ability and willingness to travel up to tfs does not discriminate on the basis of race sex color religion age national origin marital status disability veteran status geneticen information sexual orientation gender identity or any other reason prohibited by law provision of employment opportunities and benefits powered by

title: Professorship (W2/W3) Governance and Economic Policy
description: management and economics with a focus on bioeconomy as w2 tenure track assistant professor with tenure track option to w3 or w3 associate full professor open rank mode we seek to appoint outstanding experts the following research areas governance and economic policy sustainability oriented economic policy required institutional settings and processes of management and regulation e g sustainability assessment evaluation of sustainability oriented economic policy measures scientific environment the faculty positions belong to the tum campus straubing for biotechnology and sustainability and be cross appointed to the tum school of management this campus provides a dynamic academic environment with a rapidly growing number of faculty students and staff as well as laboratory and research facilities our aim is to make the campus the leading european center the field of bioeconomy focusing on biomass utilization for chemical and material use on environmentally sound biotechnological and chemical conversion technologies related economic social and political aspects and frameworks the research and teaching activities benefit from the scientific environment of the tum departments many of which have potential and promising cross references to the field of bioeconomy responsibilities the responsibilities include research and teaching as well as the promotion title: Professorship (W2/W3) Finance and Accounting
description: management and economics with a focus on bioeconomy as w2 tenure track assistant professor with tenure track option to w3 or w3 associate full professor open rank mode we seek to appoint outstanding experts the following research areas finance and accounting finance and accounting biotech industries green finance sustainable finance and accounting with a focus on holistic assessment scientific environment the faculty positions belong to the tum campus straubing for biotechnology and sustainability and be cross appointed to the tum school of management this campus provides a dynamic academic environment with a rapidly growing number of faculty students and staff as well as laboratory and research facilities our aim is to make the campus the leading european center the field of bioeconomy focusing on biomass utilization for chemical and material use on environmentally sound biotechnological and chemical conversion technologies related economic social and political aspects and frameworks the research and teaching activities benefit from the scientific environment of the tum departments many of which have potential and promising cross references to the field of bioeconomy responsibilities the responsibilities include research and teaching as well as the promotion of early career scientists the teaching commitment includes interdisciplinary bachelor and master courses management and technology as well as biogenicen resources explicitly the newly established specialization renewable resources the bachelor management technology the program is under extension with bioeconomy bsc msc courses being planned to start qualifications we are looking for candidates with a university degree outstanding doctoral degree and additional qualification academia or industry they should merit excellent achievements research and teaching internationally recognized scientific environment regarding the relevant career level pedagogical aptitude including the ability to teach english is mandatory our offer based on best international standards and transparent performance criteria tum offers a merit based academic career option for tenure track faculty from assistant professor through a permanent position as associate professor and on to full professor the regulations of the tum faculty recruitment and career system apply the new professors get involved into the fasen growing straubing campus with the chance to contribute to its development furthermore tum offers attractive and performance based salary conditions and additional social benefits the professors to be recruited for the straubing campus are committed to take residence that region the tum munich dual career office provides career consulting to the partners of newly appointed faculty as well as relocation and integration services your application tum is equal opportunity employer as such we explicitly encourage applications from women applications from disabled persons with essentially the same qualifications be given preference application documents should be presented accordance with the guidelines covered by the tum appointment and career system please send your application no later than june to technical university of munich the president arcisstraίe d mόnch germany email jobwrapper position relative font arial helvetica freesans sans serif jobwrapper apply title: Professorship (W2/W3) Innovation and Technology Management
description: management and economics with a focus on bioeconomy as w2 tenure track assistant professor with tenure track option to w3 or w3 associate full professor open rank mode we seek to appoint outstanding experts the following research areas innovation and technology management innovation management e g focusing on energies biotechnology resources open innovation sustainable entrepreneurship scientific environment the faculty positions belong to the tum campus straubing for biotechnology and sustainability and be cross appointed to the tum school of management this campus provides a dynamic academic environment with a rapidly growing number of faculty students and staff as well as laboratory and research facilities our aim is to make the campus the leading european center the field of bioeconomy focusing on biomass utilization for chemical and material use on environmentally sound biotechnological and chemical conversion technologies related economic social and political aspects and frameworks the research and teaching activities benefit from the scientific environment of the tum departments many of which have potential and promising cross references to the field of bioeconomy responsibilities the responsibilities include research and teaching as well as the promotion of early career scientists the teaching commitment includes interdisciplinary bachelor and master courses management and technology as well as biogenicen resources explicitly the newly established specialization renewable resources the bachelor management technology the program is under extension with bioeconomy bsc msc courses being planned to start qualifications we are looking for candidates with a university degree outstanding doctoral degree and additional qualification academia or industry they should merit excellent achievements research and teaching internationally recognized scientific environment regarding the relevant career level pedagogical aptitude including the ability to teach english is mandatory our offer based on best international standards and transparent performance criteria tum offers a merit based academic career option for tenure track faculty from assistant professor through a permanent position as associate professor and on to full professor the regulations of the tum faculty recruitment and career system apply the new professors get involved into the fasen growing straubing campus with the chance to contribute to its development furthermore tum offers attractive and performance based salary conditions and additional social benefits the professors to be recruited for the straubing campus are committed to take residence that region the tum munich dual career office provides career consulting to the partners of newly appointed faculty as well as relocation and integration services your application tum is equal opportunity employer as such we explicitly encourage applications from women applications from disabled persons with essentially the same qualifications be given preference application documents should be presented accordance with the guidelines covered by the tum appointment and career system please send your application no later than june to technical university of munich the president arcisstraίe d mόnch germany email jobwrapper position relative font arial helvetica freesans sans serif jobwrapper apply determined to become the key university hub focused on avant garde biosciences bioeconomy and chemical biotechnology play a major role both teaching and research the technical university of munich tum thus invites applications for professorship management and economics with a focus on bioeconomy as w2 tenure track assistant professor with tenure track option to w3 or w3 associate full professor open rank mode we seek to appoint outstanding experts the following research areas supply and value chain management value chains related to renewable energies biotechnology and resources e g supply network planning operations research digital transformation sustainable supply and value chain management and controlling scientific environment the faculty positions belong to the tum campus straubing for biotechnology and sustainability and be cross appointed to the tum school of management this campus provides a dynamic academic environment with a rapidly growing number of faculty students and staff as well as laboratory and research facilities our aim is to make the campus the leading european center the field of bioeconomy focusing on biomass utilization for chemical and material use on environmentally sound biotechnological and chemical conversion technologies related economic social and political aspects and frameworks the research and teaching activities benefit from the scientific environment of the tum departments many of which have potential and promising cross references to the field of bioeconomy responsibilities the responsibilities include research and teaching as well as the promotion of early career scientists the teaching commitment includes interdisciplinary bachelor and master courses management and technology as well as biogenicen resources explicitly the newly established specialization renewable resources the bachelor management technology the program is under extension with bioeconomy bsc msc courses being planned to start international standards and transparent performance criteria tum offers a merit based academic career option for tenure track faculty from assistant professor through a permanent position as associate
